title: Scientists develop blood test to detect eight types of cancer
text:
Scientists develop blood test to detect eight types of cancer 9:58am GMT - 01:58 
Researchers are hoping that a new cancer screening test will eventually be part of routine health check-ups as a way to catch the disease early. Vanessa Johnston reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Researchers are hoping that a new cancer screening test will eventually be part of routine health check-ups as a way to catch the disease early. Vanessa Johnston reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2DTYsEF
